text:
Love him or loathe him, there is no denying that 
Justin Bieber's success as an artist has been

quite exceptional. Whether you've been a Believer 
like me for many years since the days of Baby

or are just discovering his musical talent I 
think we can all admit that living your life

in the public eye from such a 
young age would be challenging.

In fact Justin is the first to admit that he 
has had a lot of difficulty with fame and how

to deal with that. I've chosen two clips from 
his recent documentary where he talks about

his struggles and how great he feels now. However 
before we start every week we help you understand

your favorite celebrities without getting lost, 
without missing the jokes and without subtitles.

In fact this fan says that our lessons help 
them to take their English to the next level

because they are full of new vocabulary 
phrasal verbs and connected speech. So

join almost 4 million learners from around 
the world by hitting that subscribe button

and the bell down below so you 
don't miss any of our new lessons!

So far in this interview, we've seen lots of 
expressions and phrasal verbs! If you were
scratching your head thinking what is he saying

then our Fluent with Friends course is 
perfect for you. Over 48 weeks you will

learn with the first two seasons of Friends. 
Every week you'll receive PDF power lessons,

vocabulary memorization software, lifetime 
access to our Fluency Circle Global Community

and so much more. Best part is you can try it 
for free today with our three part Masterclass!

What are you waiting for? To get started now 
click up here or down in the description below!

Learn more about connected speech in 
this lesson that I made over on our Real

Life English YoutuBe Channel. To watch it next 
click up here or down in the description below.

In this lesson you have learned lots of 
expressions and how us natives connect

our speech. Start using these expressions 
today! And if you want to learn more slang

expressions then this lesson that Andrea 
made is perfect for you. I've linked it up

here and also down in the description! And 
if this lesson hasn't made you a Believer,

then I quite frankly don't know what will. 
Now it's time to watch without subtitles and

in the middle there will be a couple of quiz 
questions. Are you ready? Aw yeah let's go!
